com.nalinstudios.iscan.edit

Class ScanFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • com.nalinstudios.iscan.edit.ScanFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class ScanFragment
extends android.app.Fragment
    A customized version of ScanFragment specifically enhanced for later-editing purposes
    Author:
    Nalin Angrish, Jhansi.
